title: Facebook is going to start telling you when you see false information about coronavirus
description: Facebook is rife with myths relating to COVID-19. Now the social media platform says it's going to help users discern fact from fiction.
content:
Posted 
April 17, 2020 05:32:15
Have you liked or commented on a Facebook post about the COVID-19 pandemic? Facebook is about to begin letting you know if you do.
Key points:
<ul><li>Users who interact with information deemed false by Facebook's fact-chec… [+2899 chars]
